name: TechniSupport SAS
description:
Create unique customer experiences with Sagicc and become a CX leader. Sagicc is the omnichannel CX platform that helps companies with the challenge of serving multitudes of customers well and in a timely manner. With Sagicc you will discover how improving communication with your customers can significantly improve your sales. We revolutionize the way companies interact with their customers by offering a solution that allows them to deliver a seamless and consistent user experience across all touch points. With Sagicc you will be able to:

• Manage customer conversations seamlessly from a single interface.
• Easily integrate with your company’s CRM, ERP, and other information systems.
• Enhance customer interactions with AI and automation capabilities.
• Measure and make decisions in real time with collected data.
• Enjoy the flexibility of SaaS cloud-hosted software.
focus_areas: Automations, Workflows and Bots powered by AI
